channel.title: tattoo on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in tattoo on Rusland 1

item.title: In Your Face: Russian Face Tattoos
item.description: Rappers Face, Kizaru, Ганвест, Morgenshtern (who regrets it), Скруджи and many more. All of them have tattoos на лице (on their faces). It sometimes seems more important than their skills. So far, only men are listed. No female Russian rapper with a face tattoo has been found (yet).

item.title: Джизус – Girl in the Class
item.description: Kurt Cobain It’s not like he keeps his name a secret. It’s the title of a track by Джизус (or Dzhizus). Hear/see Kozhikhov Vladislav Dmitrievich (2019) on YouTube (or listen on Spotify) since it’s not allowed here. И я лишь хочу вам помочь, как мне помогал Курт Кобейн: I just want to help you, like Kurt Cobain helped me.

item.title: Face 3x
item.description: About Face and Face Himself An entertaining portrait can be found in a vlog (2017, 11 min) by the eccentric NFKRZ. Face as the Russian Lil Pump. In 2018, the Russian BBC conducted an interview (23 min). Я перестал бояться: I stopped being afraid.

item.title: Russian Tattoo Tour
item.description: 2071, 21 min, English subtitled. More on (and also available via) The Russian Tattoo Tour (In Russia).
